description: An appellate court remands a case back to a lower court for further proceedings

remand_type.description: Type: complete_remand, partial_remand, remand_for_retrial, remand_for_fresh_evidence, remand_for_reconsideration

remand_date.description: Date when remand order was issued

remand_directions.description: Specific directions given to lower court

time_limit.description: Time limit specified for disposal after remand

remand_order_reference.description: Reference to remand order in judgment

indexes: CREATE INDEX remands_type IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:REMANDS]-() ON (r.remand_type)
CREATE INDEX remands_date IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:REMANDS]-() ON (r.remand_date)
CREATE INDEX remands_status IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:REMANDS]-() ON (r.remand_status)
usage_examples:
// Find all cases remanded by a higher court
MATCH (higher:Case)-[r:REMANDS]->(lower:Case)
WHERE higher.case_id = 'case_bd_sc_2023_456'
RETURN lower.citation, r.remand_reason, r.remand_type, r.remand_status

// Find pending remanded cases
MATCH (higher:Case)-[r:REMANDS]->(lower:Case)
WHERE r.remand_status = 'pending'
RETURN higher.citation, lower.citation, r.remand_date, r.remand_directions
ORDER BY r.remand_date DESC
